column1: Wtf is the point of the news app. If I need a subscription to read news articles. IN THE MIDDLE OF A FUCKING EPIDEMIC CRISIS. TURN OFF YOUR DAMN PAY WALLS. #COVIDー19 #paywalls #coronavirus @latimes @WSJ
